Package utilities

Class DBAppointments

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.DBAppointments
  • public class DBAppointments
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to hold SQL statements and executors as they pertain to appointments.

      • addAppointment

        public static void addAppointment​(java.lang.String appointmentTitle,
                                  java.lang.String appointmentDescription,
                                  java.lang.String appointmentLocation,
                                  java.lang.String appointmentType,
                                  java.time.LocalDate appointmentDate,
                                  java.time.LocalTime appointmentStart,
                                  java.time.LocalTime appointmentEnd,
                                  int customerId,
                                  int userId,
                                  int contactId)
        SQL Executor for adding an appointment. No ID argument as that is auto generated.
        Parameters:
        appointmentTitle - Title of new appointment.
        appointmentDescription - Description of new appointment.
        appointmentLocation - Location of new appointment.
        appointmentType - Type of new appointment.
        appointmentDate - LocalDate of new appointment.
        appointmentStart - LocalTime start of new appointment.
        appointmentEnd - LocalTime end of new appointment.
        customerId - ID of customer involved.
        userId - ID of user involved.
        contactId - ID of contact involved.

      • updateAppointment

        public static void updateAppointment​(int appointmentId,
                                     java.lang.String appointmentTitle,
                                     java.lang.String appointmentDescription,
                                     java.lang.String appointmentLocation,
                                     java.lang.String appointmentType,
                                     java.time.LocalDate appointmentDate,
                                     java.time.LocalTime appointmentStart,
                                     java.time.LocalTime appointmentEnd,
                                     int customerId,
                                     int userId,
                                     int contactId)
        SQL Executor for updating an appointment.
        Parameters:
        appointmentId - ID of appointment you wish to update, uneditable.
        appointmentTitle - Title of appointment you wish to update.
        appointmentDescription - Description of appointment you wish to update.
        appointmentLocation - Location of appointment you wish to update.
        appointmentType - Type of appointment you wish to update.
        appointmentDate - LocalDate of appointment you wish to update.
        appointmentStart - LocalDateTime start of appointment you wish to update.
        appointmentEnd - LocalDateTime end of appointment you wish to update.
        customerId - ID of the customer involved with appointment.
        userId - ID of the user involved with appointment.
        contactId - ID of the contact involved with the appointment

      • deleteAppointment

        public static boolean deleteAppointment​(int appointmentId)
        SQL Executor for deleting appointments.
        Parameters:
        appointmentId - ID of appointment you wish to delete.
        Returns:
        Boolean of true if deleted and false if not.

        Returns:

      • appointmentSender

        public static Appointments appointmentSender​(java.time.LocalDateTime compTime,
                                             int userId)
        Checks for any appointments and interacts with the main screen alert for showing them.
        Parameters:
        compTime - Current LocalDateTime of the user's computer.
        Returns:
        Appointment within 15 min or null if there is none.
